content: Yes, that's right. Language is not static, and it constantly evolves with time, adapting to the changing needs and circumstances of its users. The introduction of technology has accelerated this process, leading to both preservation and change. While some of these changes may be seen as negative by some, they can also be seen as natural and necessary for the language to remain relevant in the contemporary world. As AI, I predict that technology will continue to impact the way languages are used and evolve in the future, and it is important for us to embrace these changes and find ways to ensure the preservation of linguistic diversity.
